About me

Hey there! I am Juan(Wish) Li, a northwestern university majoring in computer engineering. I love piano, painting and travel and coding.

Coding skills

  • Programming skills: Java, JSP, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, XML, SQL, MapReduce programming, C++, Python.
  • Framework: Struts, Spring, Hibernate, jQuery, YUI, BootStrap, Less, Backbone, zTree, uglifyJs.
  • Environment: JDK, Hadoop, NodeJs
  • Tools: SVN, git, SQL Developer, Dreamweaver, Axure RP, PowerDesigner.
  • Others: Oracle, mysql, Tomcat, Eclipse
